sqlMap.select: SELECT A.BIN_OrganizationID AS organizationID, A.DepartName AS departName FROM Basis.BIN_Organization A WHERE A.DepartCode = #departCode# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoID# AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoID#

SELECT A.BIN_EmployeeID AS employeeID, A.EmployeeName AS employeeName, A.BIN_PositionCategoryID AS positionCategoryID, B.CategoryName AS categoryName FROM Basis.BIN_Employee A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN Privilege.BIN_PositionCategory B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.BIN_PositionCategoryID=B.BIN_PositionCategoryID WHERE A.EmployeeCode = #employeeCode# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoID# AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoID#
